attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to sack current managment at royal mail and let the service regain its standing in Great Briton.  For some strange reason this goverment and the current managment are intent in destroying the company and the postal staff are getting the blame. they are not allowed to the job they are employed to do. they cut deliveries, collections, and full time staff. they create more part time jobs (which some of these people have two jobs) who also do not have the same comitment as full time staff they are just marking time for 4 hours before they go home. i see that the govrement must get involved to find out why this service is going down the pan
